data.name: sshuttle
data.description: Transparent proxy server that works as a poor man's VPN.  Forwards over ssh.  Doesn't require admin.  Works with Linux and MacOS.  Supports DNS tunneling.

data.name: openvpn-install
data.description: OpenVPN road warrior installer for Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS and Fedora

data.name: pomerium
data.description: Pomerium is an identity-aware access proxy.

data.name: vpn-at-home
data.description: 1-click, self-hosted deployment of OpenVPN with DNS ad blocking sinkhole
